amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Energy to submit periodic reports to Congress on whether there is a need for continuation or amendment of the Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5118 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5118 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR 9/29/2006 S10800; text: CR 9/29/2006 S10800) To require the Secretary of Energy to submit periodic reports to Congress on whether there is a need for continuation or amendment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5118 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5118 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
